Judul: The Internationalisation of Spanish Abstract Art (1950���62)
Abstrak: The article reports on the internationalization of Spanish abstract art from 1950-1962. In the late 1930's modernism was erased from the map, the advocates were either exiled, died and those who remained came to be in interior exile. In lieu of Spain's political scene gaining international status in 1950's so did it's artistic culture. The 1958 Venice Biennale was a landmark for the success of Spanish art abroad.
Kata Kunci: Abstract art, modernism art, Spanish art
Sumber: Third Text. Mar2006, Vol. 20 Issue 2, p241-249. 9p. 4 Color Photographs
